{{Infobox armor poe2
| name              = Aloth's Leather Armor
| icon              = poe2 leather_armor_aloth icon.png
| description       = Aloth's leather armor has been enchanted to enhance his spellcasting abilities. It also appears to have custom decorative patterns stitched into the surface. Unlike most Dyrwoodan leather armor, Aloth's has been tailored in the Aedyran style. The torso is more heavily reinforced but lacks sleeves due to Aedyr's hot and humid climate.
| added_in          = poe2
| equipment_slot    = Armor
| armor_type        = Leather armor
| armor_category    = Light armor
| requirements      =

| is_unique         = yes
| value             = 40
| shop_value        = 200
| recovery_speed    = +20%
| dr_base           = 5
